name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: Add an irresistible twist to your mealtime repertoire with a heaping helping of this delectable fried rice. Revel in the harmonious union of tender chicken and an array of vibrant veggies, all mingling together in a sizzling symphony of flavor.
instructions: In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the garlic, onion, carrot, corn, and peas. Cook until the carrot is tender, stirring occasionally.
Add the brown rice, chicken, egg, soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, and pepper to taste, and stir. Cook for another minute, or until everything is heated through.
Garnish with a sprinkle of sesame seeds and green onions.
